game.name: DrainSim
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Captions available, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: DrainSim에 뛰어들어 홍수를 제압하세요! 갈퀴부터 잠수 펌프까지 다양한 도구로 침수된 거리를 정리하며 물 흐름을 되살리는 만족감을 느껴보세요. 배수구 하나하나를 해결하며 도시의 영웅이 되세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dive into DrainSim and seize control of the floods! Clear the city's submerged streets, with a huge range of different tools from rakes to submersible pumps. Embrace the satisfaction of restoring the water flow. Become the city's hero, one drain at a time.
